abstract: Alfred, a restaurant-finding app, will learn your preferences and tailor your choices.
snippet: Alfred, a restaurant-finding app, will learn your preferences and tailor your choices.
lead_paragraph: One of the neat tricks of the new iPhone 4S is how Siri, its virtual assistant feature, taps into the restaurant database of Yelp to recommend local dining options. When I ask Siri, "What's the best place to get dessert nearby," it grabs a list of a dozen purveyors of sweetness in my area, ordered by their Yelp ratings.
